content.rendered:
Directed by Shakun Batra

Written by Shakun Batra. Ayesha DeVitre. Ayesha DeVitre. Ayesha DeVitre. Sumit Roy. Sumit Roy. Yash Sahai. Yash Sahai. Wajid Shaikh

Cast Deepika Padukone (Alisha). Naseeruddin Shah (Vinod (Alisha’s Father)). Siddhant Chaturvedi (Zain). Ananya Panday (Tia). Rajat Kapoor (Jitesh). Dhairya Karwa (Karan). Shehzad Shaikh (Head waiter). Backagaindancer (Saur). Pavleen Gujral (Alisha’s Mom (Young)). Shataf Figar (Ranjeet). Anindita Gogoi (Friend). Ashish Singh (Chemist). Kanupriya Gupta (VC Office Girl #1). Natasha Rastogi (Tia’s Mother). Bhakti Maniar (Alisha’s Yoga Assistant). Mohini Kewalramani (Elderly Woman). Aastha Khanna (Assistant). Sahiil Sagar (Zain’s Office Staff). Harsh Shashwat (Digital Partner). Aarti Desai (Yoga Student). Neha Vyas (Art Teacher). Vihaan Chaudhary (Bejoy (Banker)). Kamal Adib (Elderly Man). Gautam Berde (Evaluation Expert). Madhura Gokarn (Aerial Yoga Student). Sankalp Luthra (Intern #1). Yamini Joshi (Sejal). Vikas Singh (Sachin). Kanika Dang (Neetu (Karan’s Mother)). Deepak Kriplani Palani (Karan’s Father). Varun Narayan (Accountant #1). Vedansh (Young Karan). Ayesha Bilimoria (Female Trainer). Takesh Singh (Lawyer). Diksha Maan (News Anchor). Ananya Anand (Young Alisha). Karan Kapoor (Intern #2). Shereena Master (Karan’s Fiance). Vishaka Kavlekar (Tia’s Mother (Young)). Kavita Gupta (Ranjeet Wife). Rhea (Nurse). Fiona Gonsalves (Karan’s Mother (Young)). Abhishek (Salim (Yacht Caretaker)). Bunty (Murli). Sunil Borkar (Broker). Varun Narayan (Accountant 1). Kavita Gupta (Ranjeet’s Wife). Alison Gonsalves (Karan’s Dad (Young)). Vishaka Kavlekar (Tia’s Mother (Young)). Arzoo (Tia (Young)). Eroll Marks (Karan’s Friend #1). Reshma (Caretaker). Rhea (Nurse). Aastha Khanna (Assistant). Sonam Wangdi (New Reporter). Yash Sahai (App Developer #1). Anaaya Anand (Young Alisha). Alison Gonsalves (Karan’s Dad (Young)). Eroll Marks (Karan’s Friend #1). Chandani Zatakia (Art Assistant #1). Rohit Kapoor (Application Developer). Ankita Podder (Art Assistant). Imran Chappar (Alisha’s Dad (Young)). Vedansh (Young Karan). Bunty (Murli). Jiten Jatania (Accountant #2). Ashutosh Khare (Guest at Party). Karan Kapoor (Intern #2). Ankita Podder (Art Assistant #2). Anup Sharma (Tia’s Dad). Nazeen Madan (Vc Office Boss). Ayesha Bilimoria (Female Trainer). Imran Chappar (Alisha’s Mom (Young)). Kanika Dang (Neetu (Karan’s Mother)). Zubin Sethi (Waiter). Takesh Singh (Lawyer). Vikhyat Sahni (Boat Care Taker). Zubin Sethi (Waiter). Neha Vyas (Art Teacher). Karan Sharma (Neeraj). Naseeruddin Shah (Vinod (Alisha’s Father)). Yamini Joshi (Sejal). Anup Sharma (Tia’s Dad). Nazeen Madan (VC Office Boss). Vikhyat Sahni (Boat Caretaker). Shereena Master (Karan’s Fiance). Deepak Kriplani (Karan’s Father). Arzoo (Young Tia)

Languages Hindi

Producers Shakun Batra. Vikesh Bhutani. Gayatri Gulati. Hiroo Johar. Karan Johar. Apoorva Mehta. Tejas Merchant.

Production Dharma Productions. Jouska Films. Viacom18 Motion Pictures
